item.title: An ARM based Virtual Network you won't hate!
item.description: Creating an Azure Virtual Network is one of the most imporant, but complex tasks you may be faced with when defining an Azure environment, whether for a pet project, or a corporate engagement. Whilst there are plenty of examples out there on the resources required for a network, this post outlines the approach and structure I have found best balances simplicity and extensibility while keeping the ARM templates terse and easy to maintain.
